patterns: Tell me how to get there
responses:
If you are coming from 10 Freeway, get off Indian Hill and head south. Turn right on Holt. 
If you are coming from 60 freeway, get off Reservoir and head north. Turn right on Holt. 
We are located on 1249 E. Holt Ave, Pomona 91767.

patterns: What do I need to start
responses:
You will need a pair of gloves, shin guards, and Master Toddy's uniform to start.
Hand wraps and mouth guards highly recommended.
Our classes are for both beginners and advanced.  However, we usually require you at least one month of training before sparring.

The price range depends on which membership package you choose.
Package 1: No contract - $75 for Enrollment, $145 per month.
Package 2: 12 Month Contract - $50 for Enrollment, $115 per month
Package 3: 3 month PrePay - $50 for Enrollment, $330 at signup.
Package 4: 6 month PrePay - $50 Enrollment, $630 at signup.
Package 5: 12 month PrePay - $50 Enrollment, $1140 at signup.

patterns: Is it too late to start?
responses: It's never too late to start
Muay Thai is for any age

We have conditioning class from 6:00pm to 7:00pm Monday to Thursday, technical class from 7:00pm to 8:00pm Monday to Thursday, Sparring class from 6:00pm to 8:00pm on Fridays, and a mix of technical and light sparring on Saturdays from 1:30pm to 2:30pm.
That depends on the season. We had days where only 2 member showed up, but also had days where 20 members showed up.
There are always some risk involved learning how to fight.
It's possible to be injured, but it's quite rate.
Although we prioritize safety, it's never a guarantee.
Yes, we spar on Fridays from 6:00pm to 8:00pm
We practice sparring on Friday from 6:00pm to 8:00pm

patterns: How many coaches do you have
responses: We currently have 2 coaches and 2 assistant coaches

Our gym have a ring, bag work area, circuit training room, and a weight lifting room.
Please check out www.instagram.com/mastertoddyla/ for photos of the gym.
We offer kid's class on Tuesday, Thursdays from 5:00pm to 6:00pm and on Saturday from 12:30pm to 1:30pm
